devdoc.author: Alex T
devdoc.details: It needs to be deployed at the same address on both chains. Uses CREATE2 on deploy to achieve that

params.amount: The amount of tokens that spender can spend
params.spender: Address that the allowance has been set for

params.amount: The amount of tokens that were sent to the child chain

initialize(address,address,address).details: Needs to be called after deployment. Get addresses from https://github.com/maticnetwork/static/tree/master/network

params._erc20Predicate: Polygon ERC20 Predicate. Zero address for child deployment
params._rootChainManager: Polygon root network chain manager. Zero address for child deployment
params._token: The address of the ERC20 that the vault will manipulate/own

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAllowance(address,uint256).details: Emits SetAllowance on allowance being successfully set

params._amount: How much cand the address spend
params._spender: Address that is allowed to spend the funds

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferToChild().details: Emits TransferToChild on funds being sucessfuly deposited

devdoc.title: PolygonCommunityVault

TransferToChild(address,address,uint256).notice: Notifies of a transfer to the child chain being made

setAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Sets Allowance for specified contract for the managed token

transferToChild().notice: Transfers full balance of managed token through the Polygon Bridge

userdoc.notice: Assists with moving a specified token from the root chain to the child chain. Made for Polygon
